Summary As a strategic Account Executive, my passion lies within developing the pathway to become the catalyst for solution growth of the Red Hat portfolio of products and services : Red Hat Enterprise Linux, RHEL OpenStack, JBoss Middleware, OpenShift, Red Hat Storage, Cloudforms.  
 
Proven success in directing development, technology integration, and customer demand discovery in order to create long-term profitable partnerships and revenue-generating opportunities for both Red Hat and our Customers. 
 
For the past 20 years, Red Hat's development model has produced high-performing, cost-effective solutions. Today, more than 90% of Fortune 500 companies rely on Red Hat. We offer the only fully open technology stack, from operating system to middleware, storage to cloud and virtualization solutions.
